name: ServiceRecommendation
title: Service Recommendation
description:
Service Recommendation

This resource is a profile of ServiceRequest. It's ServiceRequest.code is bound to a value set of common Breast Radiology Exam recommendations. It is not meant to be a comprehensive list, just a common list.

The Breast Radiology Report contains references to zero or more recommendations, which may include ServiceRecommendation instances but is not limited to only ServiceRecommendation instances.
